title: Review Referee Performance
description: After a controversial game, a team submits a formal complaint about the referee's performance. The league must review it.

tasks.description: Retrieve the team's formal complaint and the list of specific calls they are disputing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the details of the complaint.

tasks.description: Review the video of each disputed call.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes each play in question.

tasks.description: Create a performance report for the referee, noting any incorrect calls.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report that finds two of the five disputed calls were incorrect.

tasks.description: Send a response to the team acknowledging their complaint and the findings of the review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal response to the team.
